verses.verse: 'Elohim <WG2316>, who at sundry times <WG4181> and <WG2532> in divers manners <WG4187> spake <WG2980> <WG5660> in time past <WG3819> unto the fathers <WG3962> by <WG1722> the prophets <WG4396>,

Hath <WG2980> in <WG1909> these <WG5130> last <WG2078> days <WG2250> spoken <WG2980> <WG5656> unto us <WG2254> by <WG1722> his Son <WG5207>, whom <WG3739> he hath appointed <WG5087> <WG5656> heir <WG2818> of all things <WG3956>, by <WG1223> whom <WG3739> also <WG2532> he made <WG4160> <WG5656> the worlds <WG165>;

Who <WG3739> being <WG5607> <WG5752> the brightness <WG541> of his glory <WG1391>, and <WG2532> the express image <WG5481> of his <WG846> person <WG5287>, and <WG5037> upholding <WG5342> <WG5723> all things <WG3956> by the word <WG4487> of his <WG846> power <WG1411>, when he had <WG4160> <WG2512> by <WG1223> himself <WG1438> purged <WG4160> <WG5671> <WG2512> our <WG2257> sins <WG266>, sat down <WG2523> <WG5656> on <WG1722> the right hand <WG1188> of the Majesty <WG3172> on <WG1722> high <WG5308>;

Being made <WG1096> <WG5637> so much <WG5118> better than <WG2909> the angels <WG32>, as <WG3745> he hath by inheritance obtained <WG2816> <WG5758> a more excellent <WG1313> name <WG3686> than <WG3844> they <WG846>.

For <WG1063> unto which <WG5101> of the angels <WG32> said he <WG2036> <WG5627> at any time <WG4218>, Thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> <WG5748> my <WG3450> Son <WG5207>, this day <WG4594> have <WG1080> I <WG1473> begotten <WG1080> <WG5758> thee <WG4571>? And <WG2532> again <WG3825>, I <WG1473> will be <WG2071> <WG5704> to <WG1519> him <WG846> a Father <WG3962>, and <WG2532> he <WG846> shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> to <WG1519> me <WG3427> a Son <WG5207>?

And <WG1161> again <WG3825>, when <WG3752> he bringeth in <WG1521> <WG5632> the firstbegotten <WG4416> into <WG1519> the world <WG3625>, he saith <WG3004> <WG5719>, And <WG2532> let <WG4352> all <WG3956> the angels <WG32> of 'Elohim <WG2316> worship <WG4352> <WG5657> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> of <WG4314> <WG3303> the angels <WG32> he saith <WG3004> <WG5719>, Who maketh <WG4160> <WG5723> his <WG846> angels <WG32> spirits <WG4151>, and <WG2532> his <WG846> ministers <WG3011> a flame <WG5395> of fire <WG4442>.

But <WG1161> unto <WG4314> the Son <WG5207> he saith, Thy <WG4675> throne <WG2362>, O 'Elohim <WG2316>, is for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and ever <WG165>: a sceptre <WG4464> of righteousness <WG2118> is the sceptre <WG4464> of thy <WG4675> kingdom <WG932>.

Thou hast loved <WG25> <WG5656> righteousness <WG1343>, and <WG2532> hated <WG3404> <WG5656> iniquity <WG458>; therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> 'Elohim <WG2316>, even thy <WG4675> 'Elohim <WG2316>, hath anointed <WG5548> <WG5656> thee <WG4571> with the oil <WG1637> of gladness <WG20> above <WG3844> thy <WG4675> fellows <WG3353>.

And <WG2532>, Thou <WG4771>, YY <WG2962>, in <WG2596> the beginning <WG746> hast laid the foundation <WG2311> <WG5656> of the earth <WG1093>; and <WG2532> the heavens <WG3772> are <WG1526> <WG5748> the works <WG2041> of thine <WG4675> hands <WG5495>:
They <WG846> shall perish <WG622> <WG5698>; but <WG1161> thou <WG4771> remainest <WG1265> <WG5719>; and <WG2532> they all <WG3956> shall wax old <WG3822> <WG5701> as <WG5613> doth a garment <WG2440>;

And <WG2532> as <WG5616> a vesture <WG4018> shalt thou fold <WG1667> them <WG846> up <WG1667> <WG5692>, and <WG2532> they shall be changed <WG236> <WG5691>: but <WG1161> thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> <WG5748> the same <WG846>, and <WG2532> thy <WG4675> years <WG2094> shall <WG1587> not <WG3756> fail <WG1587> <WG5692>.

But <WG1161> to <WG4314> which <WG5101> of the angels <WG32> said he <WG2046> <WG5758> at any time <WG4218>, Sit <WG2521> <WG5737> on <WG1537> my <WG3450> right hand <WG1188>, until <WG302> <WG2193> I make <WG5087> <WG5632> thine <WG4675> enemies <WG2190> thy <WG4675> footstool <WG5286> <WG4228>?

Are they <WG1526> <WG5748> not <WG3780> all <WG3956> ministering <WG3010> spirits <WG4151>, sent forth <WG649> <WG5746> to <WG1519> minister <WG1248> for <WG1223> them who shall <WG3195> <WG5723> be heirs of <WG2816> <WG5721> salvation <WG4991>?
